segments.text: Brooke , are you still mad ? Is your mom mad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No ... mom said that we'll have the wedding at home on the 2nd . So let's hope your mom is right about that being a lucky day ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will be . And today is , too . I just talked to the airlines ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're going to give us back the seats ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they're giving us discount tickets on a honeymoon package in ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You got it ! We'll fly there directly from Texas .
segments.speaker: S1
